entry.title: $2400 // OPEN HOUSE 8/8 & 8/11-2BR-SPACIOUS LR-QUEEN SIZED BR's
entry.content:
OPEN HOUSE- Wednesday 8/8 6-7pm & Saturday 8/11 3-4pm

NO BROKERAGE FEE!

Welcome home to YOUR spacious 2 bedroom apartment featuring 2 Queen sized bedrooms with ample storage, a generously sized living room, an eat-in windowed kitchen with lots of cabinets and counter space, a windowed bath with a shower stall and subway tile, triple exposure, high ceilings and hardwood floors. In the neighborhood, you will find the F, G, N, R, & D train lines. Stores, banks, and restaurants, in addition to Slope Park and Prospect Park are all convenient to this location. This Park Slope apartment is a true find. Sorry, no pets! Call my cell to set up a viewing
